bibl.title: ""It Might Come in Useful"". Scavenging Among the Monks from the Hermitage MMA 1152.
Études et Travaux (Studia i Prace). Travaux du Centre d'archéologie méditerranéenne de l'Académie Polonaise des Sciences

bibl.note: Presents objects from different tombs scattered across the Theban necropolis which were brought to the hermitage 1152 and put to practical use, suggesting that such adaptation of objects to new function was in force in the monastic sphere. - Monastic dwellers of a pharaonic tombs [sic]). - The search for the ""hoards"": I. Objects possibly from the same tomb; - II. Objects from outside; - III. Minor objects. - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: Tomasz Górecki, ""It Might Come in Useful"". Scavenging Among the Monks from the Hermitage MMA 1152.

Presents objects from different tombs scattered across the Theban necropolis which were brought to the hermitage 1152 and put to practical use, suggesting that such adaptation of objects to new function was in force in the monastic sphere. - Monastic dwellers of a pharaonic tombs [sic]). - The search for the ""hoards"": I. Objects possibly from the same tomb; - II. Objects from outside; - III. Minor objects. - Conclusions.
